Brief properties from Media Player Classic:

Video: Xvid 640x272 23.98fps 688kbps [Video 0]

Rip quality is very good. Perfect aspect ratio, as you can see.

In sync ENG subs here: http://subscene.com/english/3-women-three-women/subtitle-42484.aspx

And yes, johnleo is retarded; for a 1977 film in 700 MB this is an extremely good quality rip.

a beautiful film.
